code: private void validateId(String id) {     ValidationException exception = new ValidationException().     if (id == null) {         exception.addValidationError("watch id is missing").     } else if (PutWatchRequest.isValidId(id) == false) {         exception.addValidationError("watch id contains whitespace").     }     if (exception.validationErrors().isEmpty() == false) {         throw exception.     } }

code: /**  * @return The name of the watch to retrieve  */ public String getId() {     return id. }
